--- pagetitle: "Danilo Toapanta - DEV" title: '' code-fold: true css: index.css date-modified: last-modified --- :::{.center .show-anchor-link} ## Dev {.unlisted .unnumbered } ::: In this section I have recompiled the sources, links and all the material that were more helpfull during the creation of this website. ::: {.callout-important collapse="false"} ## Note about this page - As the website has reached a moderate level of structure of my liking this page will be archived and instead used only for future references. ::: ::: {.to-do} ### To do{.unnumbered .unlisted}

ðŸ“„ Landing Page

- [x] Include News Feed

ðŸ“„ About

- [x] Take picture and place it in About - [x] Contact form/ Details - [x] Update the links i.e. 'Message me' - [x] Add an extra page called 'now' to link to [`What I am doing now`]{.codeColored} - [x] Link [`recent post`]{.codeColored} to a recent post - [ ] Add CV to drive like [this](https://www.dropbox.com/s/mylkuexn11rlifg/R%C3%A9sum%C3%A9%E2%80%94Nono.MA.pdf?dl=0)

ðŸ“„ Blogs

- [x] ~~Insert on top of page most visited blog~~ - *Keep it simple*

ðŸ“„ Projects

- [x] Update projects from CV - [ ] Embed the BSc thesis [slides](https://meghan.rbind.io/talk/rstudioconf/)

ðŸ“„ Sites

- [x] Create grid to show all my site - [ ] Create subdomains

{{< fa code-branch size=xs >}} Deployment

- [x] See integration with Github - [x] Get a domain

{{< fa brands sass size=xs >}} Styling

- [x] Comment css sniptes in both themes - [x] Arrange better the snipets in DEV section - [x] Make integration mobile version (the hamburger icon)

{{< fa wand-magic-sparkles size=2xs >}} Features to implement

- [x] Add an extra page for 'Books' - [x] Create scrollable box for links (show only fixed square) - [x] Add button to lead to Github project - [x] Click button to download a pdf version of the current page - [x] ~~Heart button if you find this blog usefull i.e people find this usefull~~ - *Keep it simple* ::: ::: {.panel-tabset} ## Useful Snippets :::{.scrollableBox} ###### Fontawesome [Search FA icons](https://fontawesome.com/search?o=r&m=free) ::: {.cell} ```{.text .cell-code} {{< fa thumbs-up >}} {{< fa brands sass >}} {{< fa brands sass size=xs >}} ``` ::: Extension at: [link](https://github.com/quarto-ext) ###### Insert Twitter ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-fold="true"} ### Tweet {.unlisted .unnumbered} ```{html}

Deployment of @Arabsat BADR-8 confirmed pic.twitter.com/97VMx9aaD6

— SpaceX (@SpaceX) May 27, 2023
``` ``` ::: ###### Use variables in text ```{=html}
Code
Hello world! See [HTML details tag - W3Schools](https://www.w3schools.com/TAGS/tag_details.asp) for more info :)
``` ###### To create collapsable code ```{=html}
Code
Hello
World - click me to open
:smile:
World
:smile:
``` ###### Insert variables in text ::: {.cell} ```{.text .cell-code} ```{r} #| code-fold: false #| eval: false #| echo: false x <- 5 "x is `r x`" # here I need to use "" ``` ``` ::: ###### To write Date: ::: {.cell} ```{.text .cell-code} `r Sys.Date()` ``` ::: ###### To add some small spaces: `
`
